Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Requires all public authorities owning, leasing, and controlling critical infrastructure to study the potential consequences of privatization
Summary: Requires all public authorities owning, leasing, and controlling critical infrastructure to study the potential consequences of privatization.
ActClause: AN ACT requiring all public authorities owning, leasing, and controlling critical infrastructure to study the potential consequences of privatization
